props.height: Height of the component as a css value/
props.itemKey: Required when using **dynamic-item-height** together with object items. Should point to a property with a unique value for each item.
props.items: The array of items to display.
props.renderless: Disables default component rendering functionality. The parent node must be [a positioned element](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/position#types_of_positioning), e.g. using `position: relative;`

slots.default: Default slot to render a single item.
